game.spot.utilities

Class QuestionVoteUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.spot.utilities.QuestionVoteUtilities

  • public class QuestionVoteUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    The QuestionVoteUtilities is used to read and write questions votes from and to the data base. all methods are static
